Description: Fragment of a painted limestone stela; Hieroglyphic text and the head and shoulders of a figure.
Curator's comments: Freed R E, 1996, in Fs. Simpson, p.302 Published: HTBM Part 5: Plate 3 PM I Part 2: p.650
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1989 Jun-Sep, Swaffham Museum, Wonderful Things! The Howard Carter Exhibition 1994 15 Oct -1995 15 Jan, Austria, Vienna, Küstlerhaus, Egyptomanie 2006 - 2009, Highclere Castle, LT Loan 2009 - 2011, Highclere Castle, LT Loan Renewed 2011 - March 2014, Highclere Castle, LT Loan Renewed
Acquisition name: Donated by: George Herbert, 5th Earl of Carnarvon
